attributes.action: Ban Luis Suarez from working in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Action needs to be taken against Luis Suarez for his behaviour on the football pitch. If a person working in the UK went into work and bit somebody, they would be sacked. If it happened another two or three times they would be in jail. Think of the example this man is setting for our children, and the example governing bodies are setting by allowing him to continue in this role.
